title: Quiz: AI-900 Targeted Review (Azure AI & Responsible AI)

questions.prompt: Designing an AI system to manage healthcare data: which Responsible AI principles are most critical?
questions.explanation: Healthcare scenarios prioritize safeguarding sensitive data and ensuring humans remain responsible for outcomes: Accountability + Privacy & Security.

questions.prompt: Which service directly enables text-to-text translation across many languages?
questions.explanation: Azure AI Translator handles text↔text translation; detection/CLU/KPE are for different NLP tasks.

questions.prompt: You need both text↔text and speech↔text capabilities for multilingual conversations. Which Azure services should you combine?
questions.explanation: Use Translator for text translation and Speech for speech recognition and text-to-speech; together they support multilingual dialogues.

questions.prompt: Which statement best describes Generative AI?

choices.text: A technique for grouping data points into clusters.
A capability that can create new content like text, images, or code from natural language prompts.
A method for predicting a numeric value from features.

questions.explanation: Generative AI produces original content (text, code, images) based on prompts.

questions.prompt: You need to output a probability that a person has diabetes (Yes/No) from age and body fat %. Which model fits?
questions.explanation: Logistic regression is for classification and outputs class probabilities.

questions.prompt: From support tickets, you want to find main issues and also detect mentioned people/products. Which features apply?
questions.explanation: KPE surfaces main topics/issues; NER identifies entities like people, orgs, products.

questions.prompt: You must extract info from international passports and from sales invoices. Which Document Intelligence prebuilt models should you pick?
questions.explanation: Use ID Document for passports/IDs; Invoice for sales invoices/accounts.

questions.prompt: Azure AI Face: which operations perform identity matching?
questions.explanation: Identification = one-to-many; Verification = one-to-one. Attributes/find-similar don’t verify identity.

questions.prompt: Why is 'Language Detection' not a valid choice for enabling multilingual translation workflows on its own?

choices.text: It only recognizes the language but does not translate text.
It translates only from English to Spanish.
It is part of the Speech service.

questions.explanation: Language detection identifies the language; Translator performs the translation.

questions.prompt: Pick the best pair for end-to-end speech translation (person speaks in Lang A; another hears in Lang B).
questions.explanation: Speech handles speech↔text and text→speech; Translator handles text↔text translation.

questions.prompt: Which choice clarifies the difference between Linear and Logistic Regression?

choices.text: Linear predicts continuous values; Logistic predicts class probabilities for categorical outcomes.
Both are used only for clustering.
Logistic is for numeric predictions; Linear for classification.
They are identical models with different names.

questions.explanation: Linear → continuous regression; Logistic → classification with probabilities.

questions.prompt: You must ensure an AI system for patient records meets legal/ethical requirements and protects PHI. Select the right principles.
questions.explanation: Accountability ensures responsible oversight; Privacy & Security protects sensitive health data.

questions.prompt: Which option correctly completes the sentence: “_____ can return natural language, images, or code in response to a natural language input.”
questions.explanation: Generative AI creates new content across modalities; the others are narrower NLP tasks or techniques.

questions.prompt: Document Intelligence mapping: choose the correct model for each document type in this scenario (passports + sales accounts).
questions.explanation: ID Document is optimized for IDs/passports; Invoice is optimized for invoicing fields.

questions.prompt: For one-to-one face matching (is this the same person?), which operation should you use in Azure AI Face?
Mining support tickets: which pair helps summarize issues and extract the names of people/products?
questions.explanation: KPE highlights main issues; NER pulls structured entities (people, orgs, products, etc.).
